PricesInfo._description: Basic module that adds prices information to item description, includes avarage flea price and best trader to sell to.

FleaAbusePatch._description: Fixes prices for items you can buy on flea cheaper then sold to traders, sticks to lowest possible increase to make abuse unprofitable.

RarityRecolor._description: This BETA feature clears and changes background color on EVERY item in the game based on MMO style rarity tier-list with colors that make actual sense. Tiers are based on trader level you can purchase or barter the item. Barters are considered +1 rarity level. Banned on flea market items are given highest rarity - overpowered. The tier list: Common (grey background, bought with level 1 traders) > Rare (blue, level 2 trades for currency and level 1 barters) > Epic (purple, level 3 and level 2 barters) > Legendary (dim yellow, level 4 and level 3 barters) > Uber (bright yellow, level 4 barters only) > UNOBTAINIUM (super rare spawns) > OP (bright red, banned on flea market). Works for 95% of items well enough to be very much usable. Can add tier name to PricesInfo module. TODO: custom lists, more robust calculation, include crafted items, customisation.

MarkValueableItems._description: Marks most valuable items by adding symbols ★ and ☆ to item names and inventory icons based on item per-slot value (configured below) when sold to traders OR fleamarket.

BulletStatsInName._description: Adds bullet stats to bullet name (damage / armor penetration). Calculates total damage for buckshot rounds. VERY usefull in raid, because bullet name is shown when check magazine action is used.

ArmorInfo._description: Adds armor stats for armor level (usefull for Realism mod), effective durability calculation, material quality and per repair degradation.
ArmorInfo._example: Armor class: 6 | Effective durability: 111 (Max: 20 x Titan: 5.6) | Repair degradation: 6% - 10%

ContainerInfo._description: Adds slot effeciency calculation for rigs, backpacks and containers (number of internal slots / item size)

SpawnInfo._description: Shows spawn info based on handbook data. Mildly useful, not representative to real spawns, can be safely disabled.
